altUpDownArrows.description: Go to https://support.google.com/chromebook/answer/183101?hl=en#pageshortcuts. Find text that resembles the source string. Replace “en” in the end of the URL with your language code. And find the translation in the same place.

appearDistance.description: In other words, “distance after which the button appears.”

askingToRateLinkTooltip.description: Message encouraging user to rate the extension.
askingToRateLinkTooltip.message:
Podoba Ci się to rozszerzenie?

Daj innym znać, co lubisz najbardziej!
Oceń je teraz

browserActionPageTitle.message: Ustawienia aktywnej karty | Scroll To Top Button

browserActionSttbDisabledUrl.message: Wyłącz STTB dla tego adresu URL

buttonHeightCustom.description: Lets user specify button height value in pixels instead of selecting a pre-set size.

buttonModeAdvanced.description: Group of button modes that don't require any special permissions during installation or while in use. Since these modes don't have those permissions, the feature scope is limited. User first needs to click the extension icon, which adds the scroll button(s) onto the page. Context:
buttonModeAdvanced.message: Brak przycisku na stronie, dopóki nie klikniesz | Zaawansowany

buttonModeAdvancedBrowserActionTitle.description: Tooltip of the extension icon next to the address bar when an advanced button mode is selected in Options. Context: https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5961162/72518776-dd309b00-380a-11ea-81d8-e229571b71ba.png
buttonModeAdvancedBrowserActionTitle.message:
$EXTENSION_NAME$ v$EXTENSION_VERSION$

Kliknij, aby dodać przycisk(i) do aktualnie aktywnej strony*.
Prawy przycisk myszy (otwórz menu kontekstowe), aby znaleźć Opcje.


$BREAKING_CHANGES_MESSAGE$* Może nie działać na niektórych stronach / witrynach internetowych:
Proszę, nie zostawiaj negatywnej recenzji.
Zamiast tego daj nam znać - być może uda nam się to naprawić.

breaking_changes_message.example:
IMPORTANT:
Breaking changes when upgrading from version 8!
Please go to Options for details.

buttonModeAdvancedDescription.description: Description of a group of button modes that don't require any special permissions during installation or while in use. Since these modes don't have those permissions, the feature scope is limited. User first needs to click the extension icon, which adds the scroll button(s) onto the page. Context:
buttonModeAdvancedDescription.message: Aby przewinąć stronę, dodaj przycisk(i) do strony, klikając ikonę rozszerzenia obok paska adresu.

buttonModeBasic.description: Group of button modes that don't require any special permissions during installation or while in use. Since these modes don't have those permissions, the feature scope is limited. Scrolling is triggered by clicking the extension icon. Context:

buttonModeBasicBrowserActionTitle.description: Tooltip of the extension icon next to the address bar when a basic button mode is selected in Options. Context: https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5961162/72518629-9e024a00-380a-11ea-9d59-90b858f0aa0c.png
buttonModeBasicBrowserActionTitle.message:
$EXTENSION_NAME$ v$EXTENSION_VERSION$

Kliknij, aby przewinąć*.
Prawym przycisk myszy (otwórz menu kontekstowe), aby znaleźć Opcje.


$BREAKING_CHANGES_MESSAGE$* Może nie działać na niektórych stronach / witrynach internetowych:
Proszę, nie zostawiaj negatywnej recenzji.
Zamiast tego daj nam znać - być może uda nam się to naprawić.

breaking_changes_message.example:
IMPORTANT:
Breaking changes when upgrading from version 8!
Please go to Options for details.

buttonModeBasicDescription.description: Description of a group of button modes that don't require any special permissions during installation or while in use. Since these modes don't have those permissions, the feature scope is limited. Scrolling is triggered by clicking the extension icon. Context:
buttonModeBasicDescription.message: Aby przewinąć stronę, kliknij ikonę rozszerzenia obok paska adresu.

buttonModeExpert.description: Group of button modes that require special permissions (“tabs” - allows disabling the extension on a whole domain or a specific URL; “<all_urls>” for content_scripts - adds a button(s) to the specified location of a page in the specified design, size, and other properties) to be granted. Allows to have the scroll button(s) always on page. Context:
buttonModeExpert.message: Przycisk zawsze na stronie + ustawienia przycisku | Ekspert

buttonModeExpertBrowserActionTitle.description: Tooltip of the extension icon next to the address bar when an expert button mode is selected in Options. Context: https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5961162/72518945-40223200-380b-11ea-9856-cbbb78f00edf.png
buttonModeExpertBrowserActionTitle.message:
$EXTENSION_NAME$ v$EXTENSION_VERSION$

Kliknij, aby otworzyć ustawienia aktywnej karty*.
Prawy przycisk myszy (otwórz menu kontekstowe), aby znaleźć Opcje.


$BREAKING_CHANGES_MESSAGE$* Może nie działać na niektórych stronach / witrynach internetowych:
Proszę, nie zostawiaj negatywnej recenzji.
Zamiast tego daj nam znać - być może uda nam się to naprawić.

breaking_changes_message.example:
IMPORTANT:
Breaking changes when upgrading from version 8!
Please go to Options for details.

buttonModeExpertDescription.description: Description of a group of button modes that require special permissions (“tabs” - allows disabling the extension on a whole domain or a specific URL; “<all_urls>” for content_scripts - adds a button(s) to the specified location of a page in the specified design, size, and other properties) to be granted. Allows to have the scroll button(s) always on page. Context:
buttonModeExpertDescription.message:
Aby przewinąć stronę, użyj przycisków znajdujących się na stronie.
Ten tryb umożliwia dostosowywanie przycisków.
To była jedyna opcja przed wydaniem wersji 9 w styczniu 2020 r.

buttonSizeInPixels.description: Button size in pixels (length, width): 35x40 pixels

buttonWidthCustom.description: Lets user specify button width value in pixels instead of selecting a pre-set size.

clickthroughKeys.description: Before, user might have wanted to click an element located underneath/behind the button, but the button was in the way and there was no way to get rid of the button. Now, such user can hold a certain key on his/her keyboard and hover over the button and the button will disappear, allowing the user to comfortably click the previously inaccessible element.

clickthroughKeysTooltip.description: The tooltip that explains the “clickthrough keys” option in detail.
clickthroughKeysTooltip.message:
Poprzednio, chcąc kliknąć jakiś element, który znajdował się pod / za przyciskiem,  był przez niego blokowany i nie było sposobu, aby się go pozbyć.

Teraz możesz, przytrzymując określony klawisz na klawiaturze, najechać myszką na przycisk, który zniknie, co pozwoli ci wygodnie kliknąć wcześniej niedostępny element.

contextRightClickMenu.description: Go to https://support.google.com/chromebook/answer/183101?hl=en. Find text that resembles the source string. Replace “en” in the end of the URL with your language code. And find the translation in the same place.

ctrlKey.description: Ctrl (Control on Macintosh keyboards) key + Click button.

ctrlKeyOrShiftKey.description: Ctrl (Control on Macintosh keyboards) or Shift key + Click button.

custom.description: Shows a number input field that lets user specify scroll up speed value in milliseconds instead of selecting a pre-set one.

disableExpertButtonModes.description: Title of a button that triggers a revocation of the previously granted permissions (“tabs” - allows disabling the extension on a whole domain or a specific URL; “<all_urls>” for content_scripts - adds a button(s) to the specified location of a page in the specified design, size, and other properties). Context: https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5961162/71878081-aa3a2900-30df-11ea-8be1-393dcf6578d0.png

dualArrows.description: Name of a button mode that allows scrolling to the top or bottom of a page. Always shows two arrows. Context: https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5961162/71781066-3254ed00-2f7f-11ea-8dbf-8d61ed0fc9a2.png

extensionDescription.description: In other words, “Adds a button (that allows) to scroll to top or bottom.”
extensionDescription.message: Przewiń do góry, do dołu lub obu kierunkach. Kliknij ikonę rozszerzenia, przycisk na stronie, użyj opcji menu kontekstowego i / lub skrótów klawiaturowych.

extensionName.description: Please copy and paste the original/source string. Should NOT be translated.

flipBetweenTopBottom.description: The “flip” is when the button changes the direction: when you scroll down, the arrow points towards the top; when you scroll up, the arrow points towards the bottom. Context: https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5961162/71781066-3254ed00-2f7f-11ea-8dbf-8d61ed0fc9a2.png

flipDistance.description: The “flip” is when the button changes the direction: when you scroll down, the arrow points towards the top; when you scroll up, the arrow points towards the bottom.

homeEndKeysControlledBy.message: Klawisze Home i End kontrolowane przez

issueReportingLinkTooltip.description: Message encouraging user to contact developer.
issueReportingLinkTooltip.message:
Coś nie działa?
Znalazłeś błąd?
Masz pytanie?
Coś innego?

Skontaktuj się z autorem rozszerzenia

keyboardOnly.description: Name of a button mode that allows scrolling to the top or bottom of a page only with the help of keyboard shortcuts. No button(s) present on the page. Context: https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5961162/71781066-3254ed00-2f7f-11ea-8dbf-8d61ed0fc9a2.png

keyboardShortcuts.description: Go to https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/157179?hl=en. Find text that resembles the source string. Replace “en” in the end of the URL with your language code. And find the translation in the same place.

language_browserDefault.description:
Language option.

If the extension supports the language that is chosen as default in the browser, use that one. Otherwise, use English (United States).

language_browserDefault_tooltip.description: Explanation of the “Automatic (browser default)” language option that should be shown in a tooltip.
language_browserDefault_tooltip.message: Jeśli rozszerzenie obsługuje język wybrany jako domyślny w przeglądarce, użyj go. W przeciwnym razie użyj języka angielskiego (Stany Zjednoczone).

language_cs.description:
Language option: cs (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

If it doesn't match the current language, then write: *name of this language in the current language* - *native name of this language*.
If it does match the current language, then write: *native name of this language*.

Examples:
If the current language isn't English (United States) but Russian, this should say: Английский (Соединённые Штаты) - English (United States).
If the current language is English (United States), this should match it: English (United States).

language_en_US.description:
Language option: en-US (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Officially_assigned_code_elements).

If it doesn't match the current language, then write: *name of this language in the current language* - *native name of this language*.
If it does match the current language, then write: *native name of this language*.

Examples:
If the current language isn't English (United States) but Russian, this should say: Английский (Соединённые Штаты) - English (United States).
If the current language is English (United States), this should match it: English (United States).

notActiveButtonOpacity.description: In other words, “Opacity of inactive button.”

officialWebsite.description: It might be called an “official website”, but since it's more of a landing page (for now) than a full website calling it just a “homepage” seems reasonable.

operatingSystem.description: Go to https://support.google.com/chromebook/answer/177889?hl=en. Find text that resembles the source string. Replace “en” in the end of the URL with your language code. And find the translation in the same place.

optionsTitle.description: Go to https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/7040464?hl=en. Find text that resembles the source string. Replace “en” in the end of the URL with your language code. And find the translation in the same place.

scrollDownSpeedCustom.description: Lets user specify scroll up speed value in milliseconds instead of selecting a pre-set one.
scrollDownSpeedCustom.message: Prędkość przewijania do dołu w milisekundach

scrollToTopOnly.description: Name of a button mode that allows scrolling only to the top of a page. Context: https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5961162/71781066-3254ed00-2f7f-11ea-8dbf-8d61ed0fc9a2.png

scrollUpSpeedCustom.description: Lets user specify scroll up speed value in milliseconds instead of selecting a pre-set one.
scrollUpSpeedCustom.message: Prędkość przewijania do góry w milisekundach

translatedBy.description: To give translators proper credit, this will be displayed somewhere on the Options page, so that people know who translated it for them. Example: “Translated by John Doe aka johndoesttb”
translatedBy.message: Przetłumaczone przez Ireek Niwinski aka MusicInMe_TH

uiLanguage.description: Setting on the Options page: language of the user interface.
